feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete, bounded speck of matter.
feedback.Synthetic: Excluded — Naturally occurring, not manufactured or shaped by human design.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Included — Dust often contains organic traces (e.g., skin cells, pollen).
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Does not rely on supplied energy to exist or function.
feedback.Structural: Excluded — Too small and fragile to bear loads or contribute to structural integrity.
feedback.Observable: Included — Detectable by visual observation (in aggregates) or instruments (microscopes, light scattering).
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Made of physical matter, occupying tangible space.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Has no internal mechanism or self-initiated change.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Excluded — Not created with intent; forms through natural disintegration.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Excluded — Does not emit energy, force, or signal in any intrinsic way.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — No capacity for interpretation or transformation of signals.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — Inert at rest; does not alter internal state autonomously.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Excluded — Not meant to be interacted with intentionally.
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — Exists independently; not embedded within a system.
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — No internal logic or reactive behavior.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not essential to the identity or function of any defined system.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — Not intrinsically representative of concepts or identities.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not communicate structured or interpretive meaning.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — No formal or logical structure applies.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not composed of modular subcomponents with abstract significance.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not direct or influence behavior.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — Not defined by time-based change.
feedback.Digital/Virtual: Excluded — Exists entirely in physical form.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists independently of social or cultural designation.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not defined by any formal institution.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — No relation to social or personal identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — Not intrinsically governed by laws or policy.
feedback.Economically Significant: Excluded — Holds no intrinsic financial or trade value.
feedback.Politicised: Excluded — No direct relation to political structures or discourse.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not involved in any cultural or symbolic ritual practice.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Excluded — Does not present ethical concerns in its existence alone.

encoding_notes: This encoding treats a dust particle as a naturally occurring trace matter unit. Traits are limited strictly to its physical properties — not symbolic, systemic, or contextual interpretations.
